name: Real 3d Car Race: Xtreme Drifting
description:
Race your dream car in the ultimate test. Race along desert and city streets. This Racing Game combines stunning, high-defining graphics with addictive game-play to create a new type of racing experience.

Game Features:
> Multiple Tracks - choose different road environments to race your dream cars.
> Multiple Cars - Upgrade to different road grip cars to play the race.
> Stunning Graphics for iPhone and iPad.
